body.name: THYGIFTREE Large Utensil Holder for Kitchen Counter Black Metal Cooking Utensil Organizer for Countertop 4 Compartments Kitchen Tools Holder for Spatula Utensil Crock Caddy
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 4 hrs 3 mins
features: 【Extra Large Storage】This 15.7"L x 4.3"W x 7.1"H extra large rectangle utensil holder for countertop provides convenient and stylish storage for your large or long cooking tools, holding 35 to 40 common utensils, ideal for kitchen with plenty of utensils, free up precious drawer space.

【4 Compartments Design】The cooking utensil container has 4 spacious compartments that allow you to classify your cooking tools as needed and quickly access them while cooking, suitable for spatulas, spoons, whisks, ladles, tongs, cutlery and more cooking tools. Keep your utensils organized and countertop neat.

【Non-Slip and Stable】This spatula holder for countertop is made of anti-rust metal material and premium oak base for durability. The 3.3 lbs. weight ensures that the utensil caddy is stable enough not to tip over when placing long utensils. Four non-slip pads on the base to protect the countertop from being scratched.
【Fully Open Design】The open design ensures good ventilation, no accumulated water, makes the utensils not easy to get moldy. Easy to wipe down and clean.

【Modern Farmhouse Look】Matte black metal wire, wooden base, beveled opening, this minimalist look kitchen tool holder can blend in perfectly with any style of kitchen decor, making this kitchen accessory a great addition to your kitchen counter.

【Great Gift Idea】This farmhouse utensil holder is suitable for everyone who loves cooking. Impress your family and friends with this unique cooking gift for Housewarming, Christmas, Mother's Day, Birthday.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: THYGIFTREE Extra Large Utensil Holder for Countertop - Ideal for kitchen with lots of utensils! Too many kitchen utensils and no place to put them? All utensils crowded in drawers and hard to find? What you need is THYGIFTREE large utensil holder for kitchen counter. This kitchen tool holder is spacious and deep enough to hold plenty of large or long utensils such as spatulas, spoons, whisks, ladles, tongs, chopsticks, cutlery and more cooking tools. 4 compartments allow you to classify your cooking tools as needed and quickly access them while cooking. Keep your utensils organized and countertop neat. Have this farmhouse utensil holder a perfect touch to your kitchen counter. **Note: The kitchen utensils are NOT included.

Reasons for Choosing THYGIFTREE Kitchen Utensil Holder for Countertop Large Capacity - hold up to 40 cooking utensils. Four Compartments - separate utensils for better efficiency. Metal Frame and Oak Base - anti-rust & durable. Non-Slip Pads on the Bottom - stable & counter-protection. Open Design - good ventilation, not easy to get moldy, easy to clean. Simple & Sleek Look - goes with any style of kitchen decor. No Assemble Required - can be used directly.
2 Tier Spice Rack Organizer for Cabinet Stove Top Shelf Utensil Holder with 2 Compartments Glove Box Holder Recommended Uses Cabinet, Countertop Stove Top Kitchen Countertop Wall Mounted

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what I needed
reviews.reviewText: Great product. Holds a lot of utensils and since it has 4 sections it is great for organizing the utensils.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My stove is in an island that backs up to my living room so I needed a utensil holder that is functional and looks nice. This works perfectly, plenty of room in each section. Additionally it's much easier to keep clean than the enclosed utensil holders.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This holds a lot of utensils. Very roomy. I would have loved to give it 5 stars, but some of the utensils slide under the bottom wire. They don't fall out of course, but they stick out a little. It would be perfect if they had a solid metal strip along the bottom rung to prevent this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It is very large and held all my large utensils
reviews.reviewText: I liked it and used it to hold my many utensils

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Finally I’m organized!
reviews.reviewText: I had all my kitchen utensils in a can and they were crammed in there. This organizer is MUCH better. I’m glad I got the one with 4 sections. It looks great and hopefully it will last a long time. 👍🏻

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice utensil holder
reviews.reviewText: This holder is more convenient than the crocks we were using as it fits flush against the wall. Plenty of room for all of our utensils. The only issue is with the small utensils that can slide through the wires. I just placed a small glass inside to put those items in.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was very pleased with the quality and size of this item. I know they tell you the dimensions but sometimes it is hard to know whether it will work for you. I have a coffee stand and use both of these for numerous reasons. They are perfect and look high end. They sit on the counter or hang (as I did with one). Would purchase again.

reviews.reviewText: Love this. I can fit every big utensil into this Cady and it still has space. Easy to get needed items without effort.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This product has worked wonders to change the mood in my Kitchen. Everything in its place. Thanks very much

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: So many kitchen items are now tidy
reviews.reviewText: I was so fed up not being able to lay my hands on the spoons I needed, rummaging around for the little brushes or peeler, now they can’t get mixed up together, solved my problem

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Large Utensil Holder – Good Capacity & Excellent Quality
reviews.reviewText: This utensil holder arrived well packaged in a cardboard box and protected in a plastic bag. The utensil holder is quite large in size measuring 40cm in width by 11cm in depth and 18cm in height and is split into four sections allowing you to organise all your utensils with ease with a very large capacity. I do also think that since the unit arrives assembled that this means there is less weak points in the design.It is made from a sturdy black metal wire cage (which has a matte finish anti-rust coating) with an oak base which looks very premium. It is quite weighty so doesn’t tip from the weight of utensils and it doesn’t shift about the countertop at all due to the non-slip pads on the base which also protects it too. It looks very nice displayed on the countertop and means you don’t have to have several pots / holders, instead combining it into one aesthetically pleasing unit.The slick design is easy to clean down and has good ventilation but personally I won’t be drying the utensils in the holder as I don’t want to damage the wood over time. Priced at £29.99, with an additional £3 off voucher valid until the 30th July 2023 at the time of reviewing, this seems reasonable for the quality and I would definitely recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Excellent in all respects except price, hence one star deducted

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I can't get enough of this extra-large utensil holder! With its generous size, it's a godsend for my kitchen overflowing with cooking tools. This sleek rectangle holder can accommodate 35 to 40 common utensils, freeing up precious drawer space.The 4 compartments are a lifesaver! Now, I can easily sort and access my spatulas, spoons, whisks, and more while cooking. The sturdy anti-rust metal and premium oak base keep it stable, and the non-slip pads protect my countertop.The fully open design ensures good ventilation, keeping my utensils dry and mold-free. Cleaning is a breeze too!Oh, and can we talk about its modern farmhouse look? The matte black metal wire and wooden base blend seamlessly with any kitchen decor.It makes for an amazing gift too! Whether it's a housewarming, Christmas, or Mother's Day, this utensil holder is the perfect present for any cooking enthusiast.Say goodbye to cluttered countertops and hello to kitchen organization heaven with this fantastic utensil holder! 🎉
